original_text: Because my people hath forgotten me, they have burned incense to vanity, and they have caused them to stumble in their ways from the ancient paths, to walk in paths, in a way not cast up;
korean_text: 무릇 내 백성은 나를 잊고 허무한 것에게 분향하거니와 이러한 것들은 그들로 그들의 길 곧 그 옛길에서 넘어지게 하며 곁길 곧 닦지 아니한 길로 행하게 하여

sentences.original_text: Because my people hath forgotten me
they have burned incense to vanity
and they have caused them to stumble in their ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들의 길에서 걸려 넘어지게 하고

sentences.original_text: in a way not cast up
